channel.title: Client freezes when i spawn certain items?
channel.description: I get an error, my client freezes/crashes and I am unable to log into that account without the client freezing/crashing again. Obviously it's something to do with this/these particular item(s) being displayed or retrieving information on it. I'm not a real big java expert, but I'm not entirely a "newbie" either, so just some sort of direction/possibilities on how I could attempt to fix this would be nice. Below is the error in my client console [code] Registering event listeners clientstream writer starting clientstream writer starting Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4149 at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:190) at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:247) at client.drawInterface(client.java:7045) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1366) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:6789) at client.processDrawing(client.java:7558) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:104) at client.run(client.java:3885) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] Above is the error I get on my client console. Could anybody "spoon-feed" me the information I need to fix this issue, or for those of you who are anti-spoon-feeders or whatever, just direct me to where I could fix this problem? In the meantime, i'll keep trying.

item.title: Client freezes when i spawn certain items?
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

but seriusly a 194? can i play?

item.title: Client freezes when i spawn certain items?
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

[quote=“kid2kewl2bereal, post:3, topic:422618”][quote author=baddy351 link=topic=525279.msg3823992#msg3823992 date=1322011311]
What are the items? Sounds like you are trying to spawn an item with an id to big for the client.
[/quote]

That’s kinda what I think, too. I feel like it’s not in the models or something. I am trying to spawn a whip. Is a whip not included in Revision 194?[/quote]
Oh, damn! It’s not in a 194, woah, I’m stupid. Hahaha, totally thought it was included!

Read full topic

item.title: Client freezes when i spawn certain items?
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

I get an error, my client freezes/crashes and I am unable to log into that account without the client freezing/crashing again.
Obviously it’s something to do with this/these particular item(s) being displayed or retrieving information on it.
I’m not a real big java expert, but I’m not entirely a “newbie” either, so just some sort of direction/possibilities on how I could attempt to fix this would be nice.
Below is the error in my client console

Registering event listeners
clientstream writer starting
clientstream writer starting
Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4149
        at ItemDef.forID(ItemDef.java:190)
        at ItemDef.getSprite(ItemDef.java:247)
        at client.drawInterface(client.java:7045)
        at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1366)
        at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:6789)
        at client.processDrawing(client.java:7558)
        at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:104)
        at client.run(client.java:3885)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Above is the error I get on my client console. Could anybody “spoon-feed” me the information I need to fix this issue, or for those of you who are anti-spoon-feeders or whatever, just direct me to where I could fix this problem?
In the meantime, i’ll keep trying.

Read full topic
